seo.title: Jak zadbać o bezpieczeństwo w Positano i na Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim
seo.description: Praktyczne podpowiedzi: autobusy, promy, schody, słońce i kontakty alarmowe — co wiedzieć przed wyjazdem.

linkLabel: Jak zadbać o bezpieczeństwo w Positano i na Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim
intro: Stay safe on Positano’s stairs, buses, and beaches with a few simple habits.

sections.title: Buses & ferries
body: Validate SITA tickets, hold the rail, and store bags in the luggage zone—blind curves mean sudden braking.

sections.title: Belongings & contacts
body: Split cash/cards between bags and use hostel lockers or safes for passports and electronics.

tips: Tell a friend or the hostel desk your planned return time before long hikes and double-check the weather alert level.

faqs.q: Is tap water safe to drink?
